item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】Yo-Yo Ma & Emanuel Ax - Hope Amid Tears - Beethoven: Cello Sonatas [HIGHRESAUDIO HRA 24bit/96kHz + Booklet
item.description:
Hope Amid Tears - Beethoven: Cello Sonatas
Yo-Yo Ma & Emanuel Ax

HIGHRESAUDIO | Flac 24bit/96kHz + Booklet ​

Tracklist:
01 Sonata No.1 in F Major Op. 5 No. 1 I Adagio sostenuto - Allegro
02 Sonata No.1 in F Major Op. 5 No. 1 II Rondo Allegro Vivace
03 Sonata No.2 in g minor Op. 5 No. 2 I Adagio sostenuto e espressivo - Allegro molto piu tosto presto
04 Sonata No.2 in g minor Op. 5 No. 2 II Rondo Allegro
05 Sonata No.3 in A Major Op. 69 I Allegro ma non tanto
06 Sonata No.3 in A Major Op. 69 II Scherzo
07 Sonata No.3 in A Major Op. 69 III Adagio cantabile - Allegro vivace
08 Sonata No.4 in C Major Op. 102 No.1 I Andante - Allegro vivace
09 Sonata No.4 in C Major Op. 102 No.1 II Adagio - Allegro vivace
10 Sonata No.5 in D Major Op. 102 No. 2 I Allegro con brio
11 Sonata No.5 in D Major Op. 102 No. 2 II Adagio con molto sentimento d'affetto
12 Sonata No.5 in D Major Op. 102 No. 2 III Allegro
13 7 Variations on Bei Mannern welche Liebe fuhlen WoO 46
14 12 Variations on a Theme from Handel's Judas Maccabaeus WoO 45
15 12 Variations in F major on Ein Madchen oder Weibchen Op.66​
